main event: A single witness observed four unidentified objects in the spring of 1955 west of Little America, Wyoming.
interesting points: The objects were described as grapefruit-like, spinning discs., The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes., There was only one confirmed witness to the event., The weather during the sighting was bright and clear., There was no evidence of physical aspects or maneuvers from the objects.
witness description: One unidentified female citizen from Glendale, California.
